thread.title: Manju Warrier shoots Vettah despite promo season
thread.title_full: Manju Warrier shoots Vettah despite promo season - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Manju Warrier shoots Vettah despite promo season
text:
Manju Warrier is a thorough professional. Despite it being the promo season for her upcoming release Rani Padmini, the actress is not letting that affect her shooting schedules at all.
We hear the actress has been shuttling between the sets of Vettah and her promotional activities, and often getting back on time to finish canning her scenes too.
Sources from Vettah say the actress has been very professional about the way she handles the time and stay till midnight to finish off her scenes. The combination sequences of Kunchacko Boban, Indrajith and Manju are now being shot at Ernakulam.
